title: Separating Terms
text: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following: $$\frac{20y^2}{\left(-4y\right)}+\frac{12y}{\left(-4y\right)}-\frac{1}{\left(-4y\right)}$$

title: Simplify Terms
text: What is the result once each fraction term is simplified?
